outline:
1. to make empty, empty out
    1. (Hiphil)
      1. to empty, keep empty or hungry
      2. to pour out or down
      3. to empty out
    2. (Hophal) to be emptied out
kjv_def: [idiom] arm, cast out, draw (out), (make) empty, pour forth (out).
strongs_def: to pour out (literally or figuratively), i.e. empty
